name: (((Sonic Bloom)))
description:
The evil <<>> have traveled across the universe stealing planets' colors and leaving them monochrome and dead.  And now they're coming for Earth! You are the only line of defense left. Can you stop the onslaught of thievery and destruction?

(((Sonic Bloom))) is an arcade-style top-down shoot-em-up with a focus on hyper-stylized art/rendering and music-generated enemy spawning, with a kick-a$$ synth-wave soundtrack!

"Playable Animusic!" - Anonymous

Support for DualShock 4, as well as keyboard.

keyboard controls: space to shoot, arrows to move

q and a to control "neon quality" (for beefy machines use the max setting for maximum "WOW")

s to turn shader off, if your eyes or computer can't handle it.

escape to quit, r to restart

Made for the Amaze Me Game Jam with the theme of "Neon"

Made in GameMaker Studio 2

Made by Team Seguin: 

ModalModule - Programming

Captain Shred - Music/Voice Acting/SFX

FreddySquarepants - Art/Animation
